semantic_identifier: [GOLD-137]: Fix non-deterministic semantic clustering creating duplicate clusters on re-ingest
title: Fix non-deterministic semantic clustering creating duplicate clusters on re-ingest

sections.text: Semantic grouping currently produces inconsistent cluster assignments across repeated ingestion runs, resulting in duplicate clusters/themes for the same underlying issue. Update the clustering pipeline to use stable inputs (normalized text, consistent embedding/versioning) and enforce idempotent cluster creation/update logic so reprocessing does not fork themes. Add a regression test that replays the same set of source conversations twice and asserts identical cluster IDs and membership.
